page.title: 07BRITANNIA PARK
page.content: {Britania Park}was opened on 27 June 1985 by Henry Cooper.{Concorde} also flew over Ilkeston as part of the fun. { {The first phase} of the theme park is meant to show what is great about Britain. Among the{main attractions} are a{5000 seat arena,}four pavilions showing off British genius,{a craft {village,}a sports lake, an adventure playground,{"Wonderland",}a village green, restaurants, picnic areas and an exhibition of some Commonwealth buildings in miniture called {"Small {World". { {Phase Two} of the park should be completed by Summer 1986. It will include centres for sports, golf, sailing and the Scouts as well as a caravan and chalet park and hotel.
